website_summaries.verdict: Two-in-one toy has a squeaker and a tennis ball inside the main toy.
pros: Has a pair of handles to make it easier for the pet owner and dog to grab and throw during fetch
Consists of tough materials, so it stands up nicely to rough play
With extra pieces inside, it will grab and keep the dog's attention
cons: Expensive compared to other fetch toys

customer_reviews.title: Jumbler football poor for our chewer, large Jumbler ball still holding up....
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 month old doberman, she is aprox 65 lbs right now. We ordered the round large Jumbler and we were very pleased it held up for more than a week and turned right around to order this football shaped. Unfortunately this didn't last an hour before I needed to pull it away from her. I cannot be sure if it is the balls shape blocks her snout from allowing her rear molars to break the handle apart or if this model is made with more plastic, but day and night between the two.
customer_reviews.author: muddinjeeps

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Disappointed in Price Hike.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my strong chewers on 3/22/19. They LOVE it. It lasted a solid two months before I decided today to take it away as they were now managing to get little chunks out of it. Came to buy another, figuring at $20.50, it was a reasonable value for the money. Now, just over two months later, the price is $29.99! Is this one of those situations where Amazon knows you like the product, so they up the price of future purchases? I've read that that's a thing, but I haven't really paid attention before. Cannot afford a $30 chew toy, so as good as it is, I'll have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but can't hold up to strong chewing
customer_reviews.text: I have a six year old American bulldog and he LOVES this toy. He's almost obsessive about it. Every time we get it out to play with he goes absolutely crazy. My reason for three stars is the durability. He chewed through the end of it within 30 minutes of getting it. We have to leave it up so he doesn't have access to it all the time. Yesterday he finally chewed clear through the middle. I think we've had it for maybe a month now. I'm actually ordering a replacement because he loves this toy so much. Just wish it held up better to the strong jaws of a bulldog.
customer_reviews.author: LSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great durable product! Great Dane Proof.
customer_reviews.text: These Kong Jumblers are great. One of the few toys my huge Great Dane cab't destroy. I have had two of this kind and one of the giant round ones. These seem easier to throw and offer the odd football like bounces. Also I think the shape makes it easier to get it back from the dog if he doesn't want to let go. We did receive a blue one and not the purple as shown in the picture. The blue is easy for them to see in grass, but they can see purples different than green too so can't say for sure which would be best.
customer_reviews.author: SPACED

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 hours !! Does not hold up to a real aggressive chewer. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My 90 pound American Bully loved this toy for 4 hours while she literally tore it into a million pieces. I'm sure if your dog isn't a real aggressive chewer ,it will probably last longer as it is very thick rubbery plastic. Wayyyy too expensive for a toy that doesn't last a whole day!!! Plus i only noticed now when I wanted to return it, that the return time is 2 to 4 hours after receiving it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Shannon s

customer_reviews.title: No match for an adult GSD
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the lookout for a sturdy football for my adult GSD, Bo. We have not found anything yet that will hold up to his chewing and this was no exception. It looked promising when we received it-very sturdy plastic and a bright color that we could easily find in the yard. Plus it squeaks which my dog found surprising initially and then ended up really enjoying. Unfortunately Bo was able to tear the ball within a week of receiving it. This ball would probably work well for dogs with average to above average chewing tendencies but I wouldn't recommend it for dogs that are very strong chewers.
customer_reviews.author: FL Runner

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Both My dog & I enjoyed this durable dog toy because: 1. Durable (Malinois approved) 2. Handles to play tug or smaller dogs can carry 3. See through so you can see the small yellow Kong Ball that rolls freely inside 4. You can throw or kick it like a football 5. The squeak is not only loud (drives dogs nuts) but the squeaker is semi protected under the handle making it harder to clog up w/mud, dirt or having the dog rip it out!
customer_reviews.author: jaime gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: No good!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the Amazon box this morning. One hour later my dog chewed the whole side open. Two hours later he got the ball in the middle and destroyed that. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for high active and tough teeth!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large 125 pound German Shepherd and this is the only toy so far that holds together longer than a day. What is also great about this toy is that even with a few teeth marks it still squeaks and with the tennis ball it is still exciting. Great toy to throw outside as it provides a lot of fun. Warning: It is not indestructible so you do have to keep an eye on it and throw away when appropriate so your dog doesn't choke on the small pieces. I would give 5 stars, but I wish Kong made these in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best ball for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this ball. However, I thought it would be purple like the last one. The o my reason I reordered was because my dog lost the other one. He’s a German Sheppard and he LOVES his ball. He’s depressed without it. Chews the far out of it and you can’t tell! Best toy we’ve bought in his 3 years of life. We had the other one well over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Wendidawn Moore

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it. It won’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: We found one at the dog park that was rigid and my dog LOVED the squeaker. We ordered one while still at the dog park. Unlike the one at the park the football we received was soft and chewable, which meant out 8 month old puppy when left alone with it chewed it up. We were able to save it, but now we only get it down for play time, any other time alone with it and he’ll destroy it. We are disappointed. The one at the dog park was so much better and tougher. So don’t leave your pup alone with it if he is a chewer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grame

customer_reviews.title: Squeaker lasted longer on Jumbler Football than Jumbler Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Our Husky loves this!! I purchased the football one and it arrived yesterday. We had also bought the round Jumbler ball; however, she had the squeaker broken within 5mins of getting it (altho I'm not sure that's such a bad thing, lol! I think the location of the squeaker is a design flaw on the round Jumbler). She still plays w/the round one (even tho it no longer squeaks) and has yet to "tear up" or "shred" EITHER toy, as other reviews have mentioned. She loves this one as well and has yet to break the squeaker after 2 days! Both are good toys and she plays w/both; just one squeaks and one doesn't!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my Nephew and Sister (Pit Bulls my family adopted) for Christmas and it is my nephew's favorite toy. He hasn't broken it and will play with it for hours. My brother occasionally sends me videos of Dexter still playing with it. It DOES squeak and Dexter is amazing at squeaking it. I think this is why my little bro keeps sending the videos. It's the doggy equivalent to giving a kid a kazoo or harmonica.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: My guy loves this toy. He is a big chewer of toys and within minutes had a hole in it. That did not affect the toy though, it still squeaks. It’s a good quality product and has stood up to his chewing. His favorite part is to bring it to me to play fetch but the toy is too large and heavy to safely throw it to him. Instead we will play tug with it....he holds onto one handle while I’ll hold the other and pull. It’s a very good and large toy for larger dogs and aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this new toy! We've had the toy for over a month & it's pretty durable. The squeaky sound isnt too obnoxious, which is a plus. What I love most about this toy is when its thrown & hits the ground it tends to bounce into a different direction. It makes my dog work trying to figure out the direction the ball is going. Highly recommend this toy, it keeps my dog entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Kexume

customer_reviews.title: Odin LOVES this ball!
customer_reviews.text: We have a power chewer who loves to play fetch and tug with partially deflated basketballs. Rope toys, tennis balls, softballs, any thing like that lasts less than half an hour. I bought this on a whim and it's been perfect for our little hellion. Its sturdy, the squeak keeps him entertained but since he has to work to squeak it, you're not hearing it constantly. It's so good and sturdy we bought another one for my son and his gf to play with their high energy super chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for mutliple dog household
customer_reviews.text: I have four bearded collies and have bought several Kong balls which they all love to play with,. I bought this football on a whim and I am so glad that I did. They love this ball! I throw it out to them and whoever gets to it first gets to be the running back! The other three madly chase after the dog with the ball and they can spend hours running after them. I laugh to watch them play! This ball is study and squeeks while it is being carried around. Great ball and I would heartily recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs LOVED this toy as soon as I handed it to them... So much so that they started to fight over it and we had to intervene. BUT within 5 minutes of playing with this, it already has a small chunk torn off of the handle. We had to remove to toy because the dogs started to fixate on that missing sport and I know they would end up tearing the whole thing apart and eating the material. :-( I expected a little stronger from KONG.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for lage-breed aggressive chewers!
customer_reviews.text: We got this toy two years ago for a large-breed VERY aggressive chewer. This is the only toy we've found that holds up (even those balls meant for horses don't last very long for him). It does have a surprisingly loud squeak when it's stepped on, hence the four star rating there, but it doesn't often squeak while he's chewing. This ball has some tooth marks in it, but is still in one piece and going strong. It's great for tug of war as we can both get a good grip on it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Y

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd loves this toy. She will slip it in our bed at night so we can find it to play with in the morning. We have had it for over a year now and it has held up very well. The squeaker is located in a spot where it will not easily be disabled. It is a good size, that she can carry but definitely will never swallow. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this ball!
customer_reviews.text: My GoldenDoodle and Curly Coated retriever love this ball. It’s easy for me to throw and it’s tough enough so they can’t destroy it. They can make it squeak and retrieve it. I think it will be around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old pit mix destroys everything. I've had this for two weeks and it's holding up well. He's managed to get a couple very small chunks off of it but it's not like most toys where once they get into it, it's done. He loves the ball in ball concept. Just carries it around and keeps himself busy with it. It is kinda heavy so throwing it around in my apartment isn't really an option. But overall I'm happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog toy!
customer_reviews.text: This dog toy is in incredible! I have a one year old yellow lab (this was his bday present) and he goes through toys like crazy. He has tried his best to tear through this one but has yet to have success. There are a few dimples where he has chewed, but nothing has broken off. I’ll be stocking up on these!!!
customer_reviews.author: JennB20

customer_reviews.title: Rehomed to the trash can
customer_reviews.text: My American Bulldog loved this but it was destroyed in a few hours. If you have a less aggressive chewer it is a great toy as it bounces in lots of directions. My dog had a fleeting love affair but little pieces coming off it forced me to rehome it in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this! It squeaks! They love trying to figure out how to get the ball out,and because it's a weird shape, it kind of rolls around on it's own when they nudge it. There really isn't a spot for them to break the toy open which is nice. I ordered 3 more. I have two pit mixes, and they are power chewers and haven't broken this one open yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wow I can't believe how durable this is!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG hit with my 80lb black lab that is a heavy chewer!!! I had given up on buy him any toys because he can have the squeaker out & try hg e toy destroyed in 2 minutes flat!!! This is very durable & of good quality toy. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a durable toy for you heavy chewing fur baby!!!
customer_reviews.author: MarciaMarciaMarcia

customer_reviews.title: Still in tact!!!  Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from my son's 8 month old silver lab, who just chews everything and anything. It has been a couple of weeks now and YES!, still in one piece. Extremely durable as either a chew toy or pull toy. She absolutely loves it. My son does have to take it away from her in the evenings, as the squeaker is quite loud, but as far as durability, it is wonderful. Actually, I can't believe she still has it in one piece, considering how quickly she has gone through so many other toys. Would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mc

customer_reviews.title: Not even a boxer can destroy this toy! Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy toy. I have a large 70+ pound male boxer and he is able to destroy just about anything. I bought him two of these balls and he still has them. They’re easy to throw and (due to the excellent design)easy for him to pick up with his mouth. He loves these balls so much, he sleeps with them. I Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Yvette

customer_reviews.title: The Best Puppy Toy EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 month old rescue puppy absolutely LOVES this product!!! Ended up so happy with it that I purchased a second one!! The product is very well constructed and requires just the right amount of pressure to squeak! We have gradually moved from every other brand toy to Kong. They seem to be the only ones to stand up to the chewing and playing that a puppy needs to do!! Great product from a great company at a great price point!!! We (and our puppy!!!) could not be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Too tough for him to eat!
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer absolutely loves these balls - the noise can be annoying but he loves it. He has about 5 Kong balls, but he bites through after about a week and then he gets another so that it won’t sink in the pool. Don’t know what we would do without these balls. The Kong heavy duty toys are the only ones he can use without ingesting them.
customer_reviews.author: dog's best friend

customer_reviews.title: Great Dane approved
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7 month old Great Dane that loves to chew and play. She carries her 'football' everywhere. She has a very strong bite and it is holding up well. Would suggest to any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong? Maybe.
customer_reviews.text: It is true that your dog won't destroy it right away but honestly our dog doesn't really play with it. It's the only toy we have ever gotten him that he doesn't play with (or destroy) so I can't testify to how it holds up to his chewing. I still rated it 3 stars because maybe it is just our dog and yours will love it. He is a 10 month old Husky/Lab mix and is a power chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Z

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toy in a variety of sizes!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this ball! He is a Great Dane mix and is a very large dog. (about 120 lbs) He plays with this ball daily and it holds up great. I also have this ball in large and medium for my other dogs. I have also purchased this for my grand-fur-babies. They all LOVE the Jumbler football toy. It is also easy to toss do to the shape. As I always say, you can't go too wrong with Kong
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We had the first toy for not even 5 min and my dog pulled the squeaker out. Got a second toy and he did the same thing. Not as durable as other Kong products (and I’ve many of them for my dogs).
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It is great to throw for her and she has enough difficulty ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Doberman puppy (about to turn 5 months old) absolutely loves this football! It is great to throw for her and she has enough difficulty keeping it in her jaws that it is easy to get away from her to throw again. When she drops it it bounces all over the place due to the internal ball and this just keeps the fun going when we aren't there to throw it again. Easy to clean and extremely durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Wamsley

customer_reviews.title: One tough cookie
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely LOVES this toy. It holds up to this 90lb American Bulldog. Only thing I can see is a bit a down side isnthe squeeker is LOUD. Drives us nuts, so we just throw it outsode and let him have at it. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Shug

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.  Fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I like everything about this toy. She particularly likes the noise. Its easy to throw and to retreive. We play with this toy everyday HARD and have been for months now. It shows no sign of wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: xena

customer_reviews.title: Not a real KONG
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off I think, I had a real KONG football, and it lasted 4 years. This one only made it a couple months, and the dog didn't really play with it so much that it is already falling apart. Very surprised, as I have bought this exact item before, as well as many other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shepard tested and approved!
customer_reviews.text: It might not squeak anymore but the small ball is still inside. Still a favorite toy! So many others have not made it through the test but so far this is still going strong.. I just purchased another! UPDATE: May 2018 It looks disgusting to me but still one of their favorites. This toy and the ball are definitely Shepherd approved! Small ball still inside, two no longer squeak and these are the go to toys outside! Playing fetch is a favorite!
customer_reviews.author: cm_grand

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so far great for aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. My 112 lb yellow lab plays with it occasionally and it holds up very well. (He destroys everything). Has a squeaker but you really have to press hard so it’s not constant which is nice! Thick and large so good for a big dog. To big for a small dog. (It’s football sized)
customer_reviews.author: Yakinhoo

customer_reviews.title: My dog ate through a wall and couldn't kill this toy in a week. Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Weimaraner who can KILL a toy in 3-2-1 GONE! This is the second one that I've purchased in about 3 months and it has gone a looooot further than any other toy that we have purchased. Especially any non-kong toys. This will be our go to toy for awhile. It's very strong. It fought a dog that ate through custom wood blinds and a WALL! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMama

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but this is seriously durable
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old 50lbs labradoodle is known for ripping apart or destroying "tough" or "indestructible" toys within a day or two. I'm constantly looking for a toy she will love but that will also last more than a few days. I decided to give this one a try and she loved it from the first moment. It makes fun noises, rolls, has handles to grab it by.... it's her favorite thing ever. AND a week after getting it, it is still completely intact! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Best toy we have found for our 4 year old English Bull Terrier
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our English Bull Terrier, who should be the tester for all dog toys made for aggressive chewers. She loves the squeaker, that she can not get to, to remove. She likes the handles, making it easier to grab. She likes to play tug-a-war with it, play catch and just lay down with it. This is best toy yet!!!! We have had it a week and it is still in it original condition and she hasn't grown board with it...
customer_reviews.author: RV Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to the Kong rep for durability
customer_reviews.text: Our 80lb lab is an avid chewer and based on the good rep for Kong for durability of their dog toys, we ordered this item. He LOVED this squeaking toy when it arrived, and we were all very excited --until he had it chewed open in about 4 hours so it was unfortunately a waste of money. Not a big deal for us or him, but it was orange not purple as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: JSMK in West Chester, OH

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!!! ....til the Dobie kills the squeaker....
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman loves this toy. I’m really surprised he hasn’t chewed it in half as we’ve had it over a week! He really likes it. It is a nice soft weight for him to carry around and shake his head and growl. 😂 He groans along with it when it squeals. It’s hilarious! Update.... He did kill the squeaker so now he pretty much ignores it.
customer_reviews.author: Amireallybuyingdoggiesweaters?lol

customer_reviews.title: Picture slightly deceiving
customer_reviews.text: My dog hasn't played with this yet, but I figured it was worth noting that the ball inside isn't proportionate to the first picture. The second item picture best portrays the actual size. The ball itself is fairly large, and the squeaker is very loud. It seems durable for moderate chewers but perhaps not for strong chewers. Wish the first picture better represented the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Destructible
customer_reviews.text: Good dog toy, indestructible? Not for my black lab! After the initial "Hmmm" 4 hrs later the tennis ball and squeaker inside (destroyed, in pieces) So if you have a dog that eats everything Think twice this one will get eaten too
customer_reviews.author: ☆☆

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, pretty big
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy. He’s almost a 2 yr old yellow lab and hasn’t ripped it up or broken the squeaker yet. We mainly use it outside and it’s lasted through summer and winter with no noticible cracks. I got the large and it’s almost too big to fit in his mouth, he usually grabs it by the handle. I would definitely buy again if something happens to it (or if he loses it in the woods).
customer_reviews.author: ReneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This toy was perfect for our Great Dane who destroys all her toys
customer_reviews.text: This toy was perfect for our Great Dane who destroys all her toys. We have had this toy a month so far and she has yet to destroy the squeaker in it. She Loves running around with this toy in her mouth and she can chew on it without pieces of it breaking off. Overall very durable and exactly what we needed to keep our big puppy busy.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Pitbull tough
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old Pitbull Lily loves this kong toy. She will play with it for hours and it holds up. Great product with great pricing
customer_reviews.author: Evil One

customer_reviews.title: Large is huge!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is quite big. I have a 71 pound pit mix and she has a hard time gripping it. The reason for the 5 star review is it came fast and is exactly as it says it would be. I just picked the wrong size. I do like this because I can throw the ball for my girl and she can't play tug of war with me because she can't get a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: LSheehan

customer_reviews.title: and I'm pretty sure that if we left it with her she ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely loves this! It has held up fairly well under supervision. However, even with supervision, it has a small hole in it which limits the squeak sound, and I'm pretty sure that if we left it with her she would manage to destroy it. I wish someone could make a toy this great that is truly indestructible. The regular red Kong is indestructible, but does not excite or interest her.
customer_reviews.author: LindaL

customer_reviews.title: BEST KONG YET
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves it, she hasn't chewed it up yet. When we are playing in the backyard, the 2 yr.-old can pick it up by the handle to throw it for the dog. A good investment since the dog has chewed up every other ball she has had! P.S. Ours is red and has faded somewhat but that is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, first one lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, first one lasted 4 years and she still loves it. But it isn't round anymore from being run over by our cars and looks dirty. The squeak is back and it bounces great again.
customer_reviews.author: Crackers

customer_reviews.title: If you buy just one toy, it should be this one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me ten-month-old border collie and was initially skeptical about the size. It looked way too big for my 30-pound pup. I was wrong. She's like Linus, and this toy is her blanket. From morning until night, she packs this thing around, squeaking happily, rolling and catching it, and chewing like crazy. No other toy had ever called her attention like this one. It's worth twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: themightypen

customer_reviews.title: Boxers BFF
customer_reviews.text: Grandpups love this! Didn't even realize it squeaked until one of them got it going. Durable for a Boxer. Durable for a coon hound/boxer mix. Dreamable for the lil guy :/ This thing goes inside and out because it's so easy to keep clean, except a bit of drool maybe. I purchased this product on sale. It did not have any effect on my impression of my dogs enjoyment received from this toy.
customer_reviews.author: LHarvey

customer_reviews.title: Tough toy for tough dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy! It sat on the floor for a couple days until she realized it squeaks. Now she won’t let the thing go.
customer_reviews.author: loveoneanother

customer_reviews.title: Kong toys are the best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my golden retriever since he is a chewer. He can rip apart the smaller size so this is perfect for him. He loves to squeck it also.
customer_reviews.author: gadawg77

customer_reviews.title: My German Shepherd loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough toy but, like all her chew toys with squeakers, she quickly (and thankfully) killed the noise maker and just left us with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Crasper

customer_reviews.title: One is a Great Dane and the other is a Mastiff Boxer mix
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about buying this for my dogs because I figured it would be in pieces after a couple minutes. I have two large dogs. One is a Great Dane and the other is a Mastiff Boxer mix. Every toy I buy them, is completely shredded after five minutes. But this toy was great! I love the kong products because they last so long with my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Prust

customer_reviews.title: Tough and durable dog toy!
customer_reviews.text: These Kong toys are the best toys we have purchased for our dogs! The football got a small hole in it and it still squeeks! Even with the small hole it hasn't gotten bigger though our dog plays with it all of the time!! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellya

customer_reviews.title: Fun fetch outside 🏈
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this football. Likes to shake it to makes the balls move around inside. She is a heavy chewer can’t damage it as hard as she tries. It is a little large for her she is a 22 pound Pomsky but she loves it anyway. It’s heavy too she knows to stay out of the way when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Paula H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy enough, sturdy. I wish it was a little bigger. I have a 90 lb lab and it’s a little small for him.
customer_reviews.author: LGHCADMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not going to last for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepard destroyed this in 3 days. First he punctured it after about 4-5 throws when he grabbed it and the squeaker stopped working Then more holes so it wouldn’t re-inflate or pop back into shape. Finally one of the holes got so big, we had to take it away before he got the tennis ball out or ended up swallowing pieces of the toy That means we spent $18 on a toy that lasted 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: William C

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and entertaining... my hyper pup has yet to destroy it, and let me tell you- that's quite the feat. She gets excited whenever she spots it in the yard, and runs around squeaking away. Really pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RUTTER

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully we will have better luck because she LOVES these balls
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this one did not hold up as well as the last one we had. However the last one was a size smaller (medium) and not sure if that had anything to do with it. We have a very playfully aggressive dog and she loves to tug. I know this toy is not meant with the intent that it will be tugged, it's just the last one held up longer. I'm going to try the smaller size again. Hopefully we will have better luck because she LOVES these balls!
customer_reviews.author: tlusby

customer_reviews.title: This is by far our pit bull's favorite toy! She loves squeaking it so much that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far our pit bull's favorite toy! She loves squeaking it so much that it has become an outside toy (the squeaker is really loud). The rubber is super strong/thick though I'm sure she'll break through it eventually (this is our second Kong toy like this - the first was a round shape).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 80 lb husky/st bernard excess chewer has yet to be able to break this down (we do keep an eye on him and try not to let him chew it too much). The two handles make it possible for my 5 year old to play tug of war with him without his teeth (the dogs!) accidentally pinching his (my 5 years olds!) fingers. It squeaks, it bounces funny, you can throw it long, the ball inside bounces around. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: but it left him extremely disappointed and confused
customer_reviews.text: This toy drove my hound dog crazy! He kept trying to get the ball out of the center and of course could not, which I think is kind of cruel. He did everything he knows to try to get that ball out of there, but it left him extremely disappointed and confused. I threw it away because he chewed pieces of the blue ball off, and I didn't want him to swallow the small pieces. This is definitely not for strong chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: This is the only toy I've bought for my pitbull/lab mix that he hasn't destroyed!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my doggy as a Christmas present so he wouldn't be left out ;) It is by far his favorite toy! However-- I did not read close enough and see that there's a squeaker on this toy, and it's freaking LOUD! Lol, this thing can really drive you crazy! But my boy loves it, so that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: SO.MUCH.FUN.
customer_reviews.text: My crazy puppy loves these - great for playing and for training. He's not a big chewer so they last seemingly forever (I've had the round version for over a year that's still perfect and just got the football shape). A dog that likes to chew things up would get through this in no time though..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this size would be great for a giant breed dog though
customer_reviews.text: Dog shows little interest, i find it cooler then he does. Awkward to throw or kick around and doesnt work well for a water toy bevause water gets in the squeak hole and is still present after a year (yuck). It seems durable for a dog that treats their toys withnsome respect though! I think this size would be great for a giant breed dog though. It is cute and unique.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Large Football!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two large dogs are scared of it but our cats and grandson loves it! It is easy to throw with the opening in the center. I think the cats like the little ball inside of it. They can see through the football to the little loose ball inside. I think it is a great toy and I cannot figure out why the dogs are scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Great but noisy toy
customer_reviews.text: I have to leave outside because the squeak can be annoying. But my dog likes it. The main part that annoyed me is that I found the same thing at a feed store of all places for $6.00 less than the online price.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Rottie Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 100-pound Rottweiler loves this toy! Perfect size and shape and very durable! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Provides a lot of play for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 100 pounds and loves this toy. It provides a lot of weight so that the dog enjoys whipping it around. When tossed it lands and randomly moves like a football. It’s squeaks so be aware. It has areas to grip to allow a little bit of tug-of-war play if you wanted to use it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in October 2017. They have been outside the entire time. I live in Buffalo so they survived winter.These are the absolute favorite toys. My two rotties play tug, chew and toss these. They have held up through it all. They still squeak too! Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marie

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Our dog's favorite toy by far. We play frizbee, and he drops it immediately when I say let's go get the football. We do not let him tug on it and he only gets to chew for a couple of seconds until I can make him "give". It's got one hole in it after a week but still works fine. It has a terrible animal dying sound I think he likes, but he liked it even when that sound quit for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: amartin

customer_reviews.title: Jack Russel Terrier proof!
customer_reviews.text: Not that I love it, but my two Jack Russel Terriers do! One of the only toys that can hold up to two terriers at once! I can't believe the 1 or 2 or even 3 star reviews, that's why I just had to give this a review. Usually my dogs won't slow down on a toy until the squeaker stops squeaking usually in 15 or 20 minutes! This toy has been going strong for over a year and is their go to toy of choice! Most of the kong toys we have are the ones that last the longest!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Our German Shepherd gives this toy 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over 2 months ago for our German Shepherd. It is by FAR her favorite toy, she loves it and carries it everywhere. It's held up pretty considering the amount of attention it gets; it has a split seam, but that hasn't affected it; the inner ball is still inside, it still squeaks (yay?) and still holds up just fine to her constant attention. When it dies, we will definitely be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Squire

customer_reviews.title: Toy vs Dog
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's the toy of the dog....it could be a little bit of both. I literally came home to this toy delivery, my husband gave her the toy this morning after her training, and less than 30 minutes later she had popped the squeaker out, and chewed a hole in it. But she LOVED IT! She still loves it even thought it's pretty dead. I was hoping after reading some reviews that this would be the toy that lasted the longest......sadly my search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but not for power chewers
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loved this toy. And it is pretty strong, but not strong enough. The toy was delivered on Thursday and destroyed by Sunday. Most of the time the toy sat up on a shelf out of his reach ( I did not want him eating the parts of the toy, so he only played with it under supervision). It was about six hours of pure joy!
customer_reviews.author: uclamates

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for aggressive chewers!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is super durable! I love how my dogs can't destroy it and actually have fun playing! They go crazy for the ball inside and have a blast. The squeaker is super loud so be aware. I mean it's REALLY loud. So if you can stand the squeaking sound, this is great. I got the circle jumbler as well and both the football and both have been great toys.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mihelich

customer_reviews.title: Big dog loves football
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 97# GSD as a 1st birthday present, and he LOVES it! He's big on tug of war, so he takes one end and we "wrestle". We've had it for four months now, and it's still going strong! No scratches or chinks, and we're not gentle with it at all - we play football daily and my dog treats it like a tennis ball. This is not used as an unsupervised chew toy.
customer_reviews.author: stayty

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but....
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice toy but our Mastiff / Lab mix chewed through to the small ball inside fairly quick. He enjoyed it while it held up!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog toy we’ve ever purchased! I think we’ve had this for almost a year now. Our boxer loves to play fetch but she’s very rough on toys. We tried several before order this. It held up so well and she loves it so much, we bought another one...just in case we lose one by throwing in the woods and it can’t be retrieved
customer_reviews.author: amblbrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: I love buying these toys for my boxer because they last. It lasted about a year until I had to throw it out because she put a hole in it and it collected rain water. All of her other toys normally last 1 day to 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss

customer_reviews.title: It's large but my dog didn't destroy it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toy my dog didn't destroy in a day! The toy is large-like a football size-but the handles on the side make it easy for my medium sized dog to pick it up and carry it around. She loves that it squeaks too! She will play with it for a long time and stay occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this toy coming in for my dog because it wasn't Kong and I did expect it to survive. It lasted about 2 months before my dog completely destroyed it and I had to pick up pieces of plastic on the floor and he got the ball out and destroyed that within a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Our Cane Corso loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our Cane Corso loves this toy! She grabs the handles and shakes her head to make the ball move inside. Typical Kong quality. I would not recommend as an unsupervised toy, as I am sure it would be chewed apart in no time. We strictly use this for playing fetch and nothing else. We only leave our dogs with Nylabones as unsupervised toys.
customer_reviews.author: 15 Year MemberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Hard Chewers!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This ball from Kong is much more than I expected! Not only does it hold up to my rough and tumble dobermans but it Squeaks! The molded handles are great for tossing and tugging and after weeks of play, the squeaker still squeaks! This ball takes a powerful jaw to make it squeak and mine have a great time with it and it is holding up great! Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Carrah

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Got a pup from the animal shelter that has now grown into a 35 pound 5 month old pup. By far this is his favorite toy. Loves to play fetch with it, but he will entertain himself if we aren't in the yard with him. Another great feature is this dog chews, rocks, branches whatever he can get hold of. I was a little worried that he would destroy it. Far from it still in great shape with hardly a mark on it.
customer_reviews.author: DRae

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. My dog is a chewer and this is one of the only toys I can buy her that will take her months to destroy. Plus I like that to big enough to play tug of war with her without worrying about her nipping one of my fingers by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t squeak
customer_reviews.text: Contacted company as soon as I received because it didn’t Squeek. They promptly issued refund. Great customer service .
customer_reviews.author: Lori brandt

customer_reviews.title: Well made! I received orange.
customer_reviews.text: Ours came in orange and our Golden Mountain Doodle LOVES it!! This is a heavy toy so be careful when you throw it, if it comes down on your pet he/she may get hurt. With that being said, this will hold up to pretty much anything! The toy is well built and the rubber/plastic is very thick. Unsure of why they put a ball inside though. The material really doesn't give.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kemph

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is heavier than I expected but very durable feeling. It is a very thick rubber. It even has a squeak in it! It is a bit heavy but will work out. I got it for my son because he likes to throw the football in the yard and the dog is always trying to get it. I wanted something that he could throw and allow the dog to get a hold of.
customer_reviews.author: footballfan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a larger dog, it's good for about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope I just got a bad unit. Holding up well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it, but the squeaker stopped squeaking after only a month of use. She still chases this one when we play, and ignores the other throw toys. Our dog is a small golden retriever female. Will probably buy another to get the squeaker back in the game. Hope I just got a bad unit. Holding up well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy.  My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My Lab/Greyhound mix loves this toy. She's a fetching machine and took to it right away. It's very durable and she likes the handles for carrying it back to me. It's a little heavier than the average fetch toy, which tires her out a little faster. It also could tire out someone w/o a strong throwing arm.
customer_reviews.author: Scottro

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace our Chuck It brand football that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our Chuck It brand football that was coming unstitched from so much use. Wanted something durable that wouldn't have the same problems as our original cloth football, but my husband doesn't use this (nor does my dog gravitate towards it) because it gets really slimy when you play fetch with it. He had to keep a towel nearby to wipe off so he could actually throw it for our dog. However, our toddler likes playing with it lol..
customer_reviews.author: Noah G.

product_meta.title: KONG Jumbler Football Dog Toy
product_meta.description: Size:Medium and LargeThe KONG Jumbler is a two-in-one ball toy for twice the interactive fun. The interior tennis ball and loud squeak entice play, while the handles make pickup and shaking easy. The Jumbler stands up to tough play, making it ideal for games of fetch. Available in two shapes and sizes, the KONG Jumbler will ensure an exciting, active play session for you and your dog. Covered by KONG Satisfaction Guarantee. See KONG Satisfaction Guarantee document below for full details.
feature_bullets: Squeaker and tumbling interior ball entice play
Handles make pick up and shaking easy
Available in two shapes: Ball and Football

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
